changeSet.author: MLR
changeSet.createView: SELECT a.affiliate_id, GROUP_CONCAT(c.common_name SEPARATOR ' ') AS countries FROM application a JOIN member m ON m.member_id = a.member_id JOIN country c ON c.iso_code_2 = m.key WHERE a.approval_state = 'APPROVED' GROUP BY a.affiliate_id;
